Text.Page: I wish I could help, but my hands are tied, friend. Are you sure you have the right bank?
When it comes to spare gear, there's no place safer than a bank vault.
We can hold your items for youâ€”no questions asked.
Go. Bring enlightenment to the masses. We'll watch your things.
Trust me, the wisest investment you can make is your community. Wait and see.
